stimulusHtml: The ideology represented in the image had which of the following effects on neighboring Spain?

features.html:
Refer to the image below.

Photo of a unit of the Mocidade Portuguesa Feminina (Portuguese Women’s Youth Organization) in front of a monument to Henry the Navigator, Lisbon, late 1930s.

Z1 Collection / Alamy

choicesHtml: Spanish industrialization lagged behind that of the rest of western Europe.
Spain lost its remaining colonies in the Americas.
Germany and Italy intervened in the Spanish Civil War.
Spain joined the NATO alliance after the Second World War.
